game.name: Trushybin & Removin: What I Couldn’t Delete
game.categories: Single-player, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 3D 플랫폼 게임. 순수한 데스크톱 아이콘인 트러시빈과 리모빈은 자신들을 사용하는 소녀가 왜 모든 것을 삭제하려 하는지— 기억과 그녀 자신까지도—그 이유를 알고 싶어한다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 3D platformer where Trushybin and Removin, two innocent PC icons, try to understand why the girl who uses them wants to delete everything… even memories and parts of herself.
